name: Apocarmalypse
description:
The apocalypse is coming for you !

But you can still survive a few more days to save the people. Jump in your cool car and share your fuel with survivors to help them escape the apocalypse.

Controls :

  • [A] and [D] To move up and down.
  • [Space] To rescue a survivor.
  • [Click] On a follower fuel bar to share your fuel with him.

1.1 : This Post LD44 Version fixes a wrong configuration of the project settings and graphic settings. The keyboard inputs were not always taken and the shadows were missing.

1.2 : The keyboard lags were still here, finally fixed it and added a back to main menu button.
